mapper.select: select pick.userId, pick.productId, p.productName, p.price ,img.imagePath FROM USER_PICKPRODUCT pick INNER JOIN product p ON p.productId= pick.productId INNER JOIN product_image img ON p.productId = img.productId WHERE pick.userId = #{userId} AND img.imageType = "PRODUCT"
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_PICKPRODUCT WHERE userId = #{userId} AND productId = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USER_PICKPRODUCT WHERE userId = #{userId} AND productId = #{productId}
